title: President Donald J. Trump Signed H.R. 7187 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
December 1, 2018
On Saturday, December 1, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 7187, the “National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018,” which authorizes the Federal Emergency Management Agency to enter into new contracts for flood insurance and borrow from the Treasury up to specified amounts through December 7, 2018.
